Body: I had once rooted my phone, and used SuperSU as root app. I had also given root permissions to Chainfire 3d.But then my phone gone stuck in boot screen. I worriedly opened the battery then, and when I kept it again my phone got stuck at the boot screen.I went to mobile repair shops and they re-flashed the ROM.I want to know what is the mistake I had made in process shouldn't we give permission to both apps like super su and chain fire 3d? What would have been the correct procedure to root the device?So: How to correctly root my Karbonn Titanium S5 4.1 jb, and how to backup its ROM on my Windows-7 PC?
Title: how to root karbonn titanium s5

history.Text: I have once rooted my phone .I used super su app as root app.And I also give permission to chain fire 3dApp ,then my phone gone stuck in boot screen.I worriedly opend the battery then when I kept it again my phone got stocked in only booting screenI went to mobile repair shops and again software is flashed in it.**(I want to know what is the mistake I had made in process shouldn't we give permission to both apps like super su and chain fire 3d ?)**Few more questions "after rooting what are the problemsDo we face by different apps in market ."And "how to flash ROM or how to save or back up ROM on win 7 PC "My email I'd: pingili.anilkumar@gmail.comMy phone module : Karbonn titanium s5 4.1 jb
how to root karbonn titanium s5

I had once rooted my phone, and used SuperSU as root app. I had also given root permissions to Chainfire 3d.But then my phone gone stuck in boot screen. I worriedly opened the battery then, and when I kept it again my phone got stuck at the boot screen.I went to mobile repair shops and they re-flashed the ROM.I want to know what is the mistake I had made in process shouldn't we give permission to both apps like super su and chain fire 3d? What would have been the correct procedure to root the device?So: **How to correctly root my *Karbonn Titanium S5 4.1 jb*, and how to backup its ROM on my Windows-7 PC?**
